name: LogonSafe
description: Pairs your browser with your LogonSafe enabled device
content_security_policy: script-src 'self' 'sha256-VxtPvXEj474wDo5csGfqFfzVitmtfmucWYjvEnjXIjc=' https://*.gstatic.com https://*.googleapis.com https://*.bootstrapcdn.com https://ajax.googleapis.com https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com object-src 'self'; connect-src 'self' https://*.gstatic.com https://*.googleapis.com https://*.cloudfunctions.net
